text: "Johnny 99" is a song written and recorded by Bruce Springsteen. It is the fourth track from his sixth studio album Nebraska and was never released as a single it still charted at number 50 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. It was covered by Johnny Cash for his 69th studio album Johnny 99 in 1983. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Blues music Category:Country songs Category:Rockabilly songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Johnny Cash songs
title: Johnny 99 (song)
